mapper.sql: id, activityName, addTime, belongManager, status, shareImage, shareText, updateTime, templateId, QRCode
mapper.select: SELECT a.templateUrl FROM SYSTEM_TEMPLATE a, SYSTEM_ACTIVITY b WHERE b.id = #{activityId} AND a.id = b.templateId
SELECT FROM SYSTEM_ACTIVITY WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYSTEM_ACTIVITY (activityName, addTime, belongManager, shareImage, shareText, updateTime, templateId) VALUES (#{activityName}, #{addTime}, #{belongManager}, #{shareImage}, #{shareText}, #{updateTime}, #{templateId})
mapper.update: UPDATE SYSTEM_ACTIVITY SET shareImage = #{shareImage}, shareText = #{shareText}, updateTime = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE SYSTEM_ACTIVITY SET QRCode = #{QRCode} WHERE id = #{id}
